function.description:
Inserts documents into a collection. Returns `null`. A robot exception will be generated if the update failed. The `options` parameter may contain the following option:
| Option | Description | | ---------- | ----------- | | `ordered` | If set to true, documents will be inserted in the order provided, stopping on the first failed insertion. The default is true. If false, the server will attempt to insert all the documents regardless of an failures.

example.title: Usage
example.header: Insert a list of documents into a collection
